mapper.select: SELECT M.USER_ID, M.USER_PWD, M.DEPT_CODE, D.DEPT_TITLE DEPT_NAME, c.sub_name position, M.USER_NAME, M.PHONE, TO_CHAR(M.BIRTH_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as BIRTH_DATE, M.EDUCATION, M.ADDRESS, M.ZIP_CODE, M.DETAIL_ADD, TO_CHAR(M.HIRE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') HIRE_DATE, TO_CHAR( M.RETIRE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as RETIRE_DATE, M.SUPER_RIGHT, M.HR_RIGHT, M.SP_RIGHT, M.BOARD_RIGHT, M.DEPT_RIGHT, M.PROFILE_URL, M.SIGN_URL, M.DAYOFF, M.SECONDARY_CODE, M.SECONDARY_USESE, M.RANK_BCODE, M.REG_DATE, M.MOD_DATE, M.REG_ID, M.MOD_ID, M.DEL_YN, M.GENDER, TRUNC(months_between(SYSDATE,M.HIRE_DATE) /12) as SERVICEYEAR FROM TB_MEMBER M JOIN TB_COMMON C ON M.RANK_BCODE = C.MAIN_CODE AND M.RANK_SCODE = C.SUB_CODE JOIN tb_dept D ON M.DEPT_CODE = D.dept_code ORDER BY c.SUB_CODE DESC

SELECT M.USER_ID, M.USER_PWD, M.DEPT_CODE, D.DEPT_TITLE DEPT_NAME, c.sub_name position, M.USER_NAME, M.PHONE, TO_CHAR(M.BIRTH_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as BIRTH_DATE, M.EDUCATION, M.ADDRESS, M.ZIP_CODE, M.DETAIL_ADD, TO_CHAR(M.HIRE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') HIRE_DATE, TO_CHAR( M.RETIRE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as RETIRE_DATE, M.SUPER_RIGHT, M.HR_RIGHT, M.SP_RIGHT, M.BOARD_RIGHT, M.DEPT_RIGHT, M.PROFILE_URL, M.SIGN_URL, M.DAYOFF, M.SECONDARY_CODE, M.SECONDARY_USESE, M.RANK_BCODE, M.REG_DATE, M.MOD_DATE, M.REG_ID, M.MOD_ID, M.DEL_YN, M.GENDER, TRUNC(months_between(SYSDATE,M.HIRE_DATE) /12) as SERVICEYEAR FROM TB_MEMBER M JOIN TB_COMMON C ON M.RANK_BCODE = C.MAIN_CODE AND M.RANK_SCODE = C.SUB_CODE JOIN tb_dept D ON M.DEPT_CODE = D.dept_code WHERE M.USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY c.SUB_CODE DESC
SELECT DEPT_CODE ,DEPT_TITLE FROM TB_DEPT where del_yn ='N' ORDER BY DEPT_CODE DESC
SELECT c.sub_code ,c.sub_name FROM TB_COMMON C where MAIN_CODE = '007-'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MEMBER ( USER_ID , DEPT_CODE , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , PHONE , BIRTH_DATE , EDUCATION , ADDRESS , ZIP_CODE , DETAIL_ADD , HIRE_DATE , RETIRE_DATE , SUPER_RIGHT , HR_RIGHT , SP_RIGHT , BOARD_RIGHT , DEPT_RIGHT , PROFILE_URL , SIGN_URL , DAYOFF , SECONDARY_CODE , SECONDARY_USESE , RANK_BCODE , RANK_SCODE , REG_DATE , MOD_DATE , REG_ID , MOD_ID , DEL_YN , GENDER ) VALUES ( #{userId} , #{deptCode} , #{userPwd} , #{userName} , #{phone} , TO_DATE(#{birthDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , #{education} , #{address} , #{zipCode} , #{detailAdd} , TO_DATE(#{hireDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , NULL , 'N' , 'N' , 'N' , 'N' , 'N' , NULL , NULL , 12 , 'N' , 'N' , '007-' , #{rankScode} , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , 'admin01' , 'admin01' , 'N' , #{gender} )
